result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angel Linton

records.addlTxt:
8:29 AM Defendant Angel Linton in court.  Attorney Scott L. Stebbins in court for Angel Linton.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Stebbins heard - has reviewed with Deft.
Deft understands.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules.
8:31 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 15, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Atty Scott Stebbins appointed as dean atty - repayment by Deft of $100 per mth comm 10-15-2022

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Letter from JA to Deft re: dean atty
Adjourned initial appearance on October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
9:49 AM Defendant Angel Linton appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney DeShea D. Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Brad Hansen is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
Atty Hansen heard - has reviewed with Deft and Deft understands.
Court inquires on Atty.
DA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Hansen heard on bond.
DA argues.
Atty Hansen argues.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $1,000 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances illegal in WI today and including THC in any form, w/o a valid Rx, no contact with the victims, or Lolli's Tavern, no entry into any bars, taverns, liquor stores, or restaurants that sell alcohol, no discussions with her husband who is a co-deft about this case, if there is any alcohol in the home, Deft to have 1 hour to remove all alcohol from the home.
Deft to contact the Public Defender's office today.
Court schedules with parties.
10:15 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
